K

keyPressed() - Method in class edu.bu.segrelab.comets.CometsRunPanel
Key functions
P/p - saves the current frame as an image using the current image format
Q/q - ends the simulation (doesn't really do much in this Java version - but stopped everything in Processing)
C/c - prints the number of living cells in the console
spacebar - pause/unpause
B/b - prints all biomass for all current cells
T/t - prints the total biomass for all Model species to the console
D/d - toggles the current world display variable (either biomass or nutrient) up through the list
C/c - toggled the current world display variable down throught the list
X/x - shows the currently selected world display variable
S/s - toggles between relative and absolute color modes
A/a - decreases the overall saturation in absolute color mode
Z/z - increases the overall saturation in absolute color mode
W/w - displays a string describing the current set of CometsParameters
